title: Combat Diary: The Marines of Lima Company [2006 - USA] docu
description:
Combat Diary: The Marines of Lima Company (2006 - USA)

Documentary
 
http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0852946/


Primetime Emmy Awards - Nominated - Exceptional Merit in Nonfiction Filmmaking

Everyone nods and agrees that war is brutal, rarely is that brutality glimpsed as vividly as in Combat Diary: The Marines of Lima Company. During their 2005 tour of duty in Iraq, Lima Company â€“ a unit of Marines, all from Ohio â€“ lost 23 men on the front lines. Combat Diary combines footage shot by the Marines themselves with home digital cameras and interviews with many of the surviving soldiers and parents and wives of men who died. The soldier's footage ranges from bored hijinks to actual firefights, including a troubling, surreal scene of men in full gear, with rifles ready, patrolling through a crowded Iraqi bazaar.


Video: MPEG4 Video (H264), 704x400, 25.000 fps, 1150 Kbps, 01h29m56s
Audio: AAC, 48000 Hz, stereo

DVDRip, English audio, no subtitles
